# Ensure Python 3.x is installed
# For Windows, download the installer from:
# https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/
# For Ubuntu/Debian, you can install Python using:
# sudo apt-get install python3

# Ensure pip is installed
# For Windows, pip is usually included with Python installations.
# For Ubuntu/Debian, you can install pip using:
# sudo apt-get install python3-pip

# Tkinter is usually included with Python installations, but if you need to install it separately, you can use:
# For Ubuntu/Debian:
# sudo apt-get install python3-tk

# If you are using a specific environment where tkinter is not available, you might need to install it.
# Uncomment the line below if needed.
# tk
